title: (x) Italic H from airmici's home page - probably custom {Florian, Riccardo}
content:
Hi,  
I'm trying to find out if this H is cutom made or part of a family, the rest should be adobe caslon bold italic.

comments.content:
Ciao Alessandro,  
that's most likely custom.  
F
Most probably constructed using an italic (swash) J or I.
